287439.「……ずっと 待ちわびていました。\n あなたの 数千年の旅路が\n ようやく終:
I've long awaited this day... The day your
journey over thousands of years finally
comes to end.

287440.「お帰りなさい <kyodai>さん。\n ここは 生まれ変わった エテーネの村:
Welcome back, <kyodai>.
This is Ethene Village reborn!

287441.「ここから また始めよう……。\n おいらたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start over...a new future for the three
of us.

287443.冥王ネルゲルの襲来により\nバラバラの運命をたどった３人が\nついに 新エテーネ:
The three whose fates were scattered by the
invasion of the Netherlord Nergel were finally
reunited in Ethene Village once again!

287444.エテーネ村の人々は <kyodai>の帰郷を祝い\n宴を開き これまでのことを語:
The villagers celebrated 's return with a gigantic feast. They shared everything that had happened, the
conversation having no end in sight...

287446.村の西にある 無人の水車小屋を\n<kyodai>の 新しい研究室として\nリフ:
The unoccupied water cabin in the west part of
the village was renovated as <kyodai>'s
new research laboratory!<me 71>

287447.「ここから また始めようぜ……。\n オレたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start over...a new future for the three
of us.

287448.「ここから また始めましょ……。\n あたしたち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start over...a new future for the three
of us.

287449.「ここから また始めよう……。\n 私たち ３人の 新しい未来を。:
Let's start over...a new future for the three
of us.
